text: Heinz Friedrich Dressel (28 September 1929 - 4 August 2017) was a German theologian and writer. He was born in Marktredwitz, Germany. His work focused on human rights and the history of Brazil. He wrote many books about the history of Latin America and views of Christianity. Dressel died on 4 August 2017 in Nuremberg, Germany at the age of 87.Anzeige Heinz Friedrich Dressel. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German theologians Category:German historians Category:Writers from Bavaria
title: Heinz F. Dressel
